We do not share your personal information (such as email addresses) with unaffiliated third parties so they can serve you with advertisements.
But we also allow third parties to collect information about your online activities through cookies and other technologies.
advertising networks, who collect information about your interests when you view or interact with one of the advertisements they place on many different websites on the Internet.
business partners, who collect information when you view or interact with one of their advertisements on our sites, and

Please note that we do not have access to or control over cookies or other technologies these third parties may use to collect information about your interests, and the information practices of these third parties are not covered by this Privacy Policy.
